name: 47 Meters Down: Uncaged
summary_text: Two sisters diving in a ruined underwater city quickly learn they've entered the territory of the deadliest shark species in the claustrophobic labyrinth of submerged caves.

name: Killer's Kiss
summary_text: Ready to catch a train to his hometown, a washed-up boxer tells us about the strange and twisty events that happened to him the past couple of days.

name: Super 30
summary_text: Based on the life of Patna-based mathematician Anand Kumar who runs the famed Super 30 program for IIT aspirants in Patna.

name: The Story of Us
summary_text: Ben and Katie Jordan are a married couple who go through hard times in fifteen years of marriage.

name: My Darling Clementine
summary_text: After their cattle are stolen and their brother murdered, the Earp brothers have a score to settle with the Clanton family.

name: Stomp the Yard
summary_text: When his brother is murdered, a street dancer moves to Georgia to work his way through college. He joins a fraternity's step dancing team for a competition. Will he also get an education and the girl?

name: Birdy
summary_text: After two friends return home from the Vietnam War one becomes mentally unstable and obsesses with becoming a bird.

name: How Green Was My Valley
summary_text: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans, he stern, she gentle, raise coal-mining sons and hope their youngest will find a better life.

name: Certified Copy
summary_text: In Tuscany to promote his latest book, a middle-aged British writer meets a French woman who leads him to the village of Lucignano. While there, a chance question reveals something deeper.

name: Out for Justice
summary_text: The gruesome murder of a Brooklyn Detective will turn the case into a personal vendetta when the deceased's best friend and fellow officer will unleash an all-out attack against a psychotic Mafia enforcer's brutal gang.

name: Forgotten
summary_text: When his abducted brother returns seemingly a different man with no memory of the past 19 days, Jin-seok chases after the truth behind the kidnapping.

name: Closed Circuit
summary_text: A high-profile terrorism case unexpectedly binds together two ex-lovers on the defense team - testing the limits of their loyalties and placing their lives in jeopardy.

name: Brokedown Palace
summary_text: Two women are arrested for smuggling while vacationing in Thailand.

name: The Final Countdown
summary_text: A modern aircraft carrier is thrown back in time to 1941 near Hawaii, just hours before the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor.

name: Alice Doesn't Live Here Anymore
summary_text: A recently widowed woman is on the road with her precocious young son, determined to make a new life for herself as a singer.

name: The End of the Affair
summary_text: A desperate man tries to find out why his beloved left him years ago.

name: Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior
summary_text: Tanhaji Malusare, a military chieftain in the army of the Maratha king Shivaji, leads the charge to capture the strategically important Kondhana fort guarded by the army of the fierce Rajput chieftain Udaybhan Rathod.

name: The Breadwinner
summary_text: In 2001, Afghanistan is under the control of the Taliban. When her father is captured, a determined young girl disguises herself as a boy in order to provide for her family.

name: Tom and Jerry
summary_text: A chaotic battle ensues between Jerry Mouse, who has taken refuge in the Royal Gate Hotel, and Tom Cat, who is hired to drive him away before the day of a big wedding arrives.

name: Down to Earth
summary_text: After dying before his time, an aspiring black comic gets a second shot at life - by being placed in the body of a wealthy white businessman.

name: The Trip
summary_text: Steve Coogan has been asked by The Observer to tour the country's finest restaurants, but after his girlfriend backs out on him he must take his best friend and source of eternal aggravation, Rob Brydon.

name: Medicine Man
summary_text: In the beautiful and dangerous Amazon rainforest, dissimilar people must make their choices between business, science, and love.

name: Birdemic: Shock and Terror
summary_text: A horde of mutated birds descends upon the quiet town of Half Moon Bay, California. With the death toll rising, Two citizens manage to fight back, but will they survive Birdemic?

name: The Wild Pear Tree
summary_text: An unpublished writer returns to his hometown after graduating, where he seeks sponsors to publish his book while dealing with his father's deteriorating indulgence into gambling.

name: Eega
summary_text: A murdered man is reincarnated as a housefly and seeks to avenge his death.

name: St. Trinian's
summary_text: In order to save their bankrupt school, a group of troublesome girls stage a robbery with a group of geniuses on their backs

name: Hoffa
summary_text: The story of the notorious American labor union figure Jimmy Hoffa, who organizes a bitter strike, makes deals with members of the organized crime syndicate and mysteriously disappears in 1975.

name: 9 Songs
summary_text: In London, intense sexual encounters take place between an American college student, named Lisa, and an English scientist, named Matt, between attending rock concerts.

name: Arjun Reddy
summary_text: Arjun Reddy, a short tempered house surgeon gets used to drugs and drinks when his girlfriend is forced to marry another person.

name: Marshall
summary_text: The story of Thurgood Marshall, the crusading lawyer who would become the first African-American Supreme Court Justice, as he battles through one of his career-defining cases.

name: Chinese Zodiac
summary_text: A man searches the world for a set of mystic artifacts. The twelve bronze heads of the animals from the Chinese zodiac.

name: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
summary_text: In 1850 Oregon, when a backwoodsman brings a wife home to his farm, his six brothers decide that they want to get married too.

name: Fireproof
summary_text: In an attempt to save his marriage, a firefighter uses a 40-day experiment known as "The Love Dare."

name: Horsemen
summary_text: A recently widowed detective still grieving over his wife's death discovers a shocking connection between a serial killing spree and the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.

name: Kill Me Three Times
summary_text: Professional hit-man Charlie Wolfe finds himself in three tales of murder, blackmail and revenge after a botched contract assignment.

name: The Outsider
summary_text: An epic set in post-WWII Japan and centered on an American former G.I. who joins the yakuza.

name: MI-5
summary_text: When a terrorist escapes custody during a routine handover, Will Holloway must team with disgraced MI5 Intelligence Chief Harry Pearce to track him down before an imminent terrorist attack on London.

name: They Came Together
summary_text: Molly owns a quaint little sweet shop. Joel works for a gigantic candy company threatening to shut her down. How they meet, fall in love, break up and get back together is hilariously recounted in this rom-com spoof.

name: Sgt. Bilko
summary_text: Sgt. Bilko is a well-liked conman in charge of the army base's motor pool, developing a hover tank and unofficially of gambling etc. One man hates Bilko and he's coming to inspect the base for possible closure.

name: Glitter
summary_text: A young singer dates a disc jockey who helps her get into the music business, but their relationship become complicated as she ascends to super stardom.

name: Material Girls
summary_text: Two wealthy sisters, both heiresses to their family's cosmetics fortune, are given a wake-up call when a scandal and ensuing investigation strip them of their wealth.

name: Koi... Mil Gaya
summary_text: A developmentally disabled young man tries to continue the work his father did in communicating with extra-terrestrials from outer space, which leads to something miraculous and wonderful.

name: My Man Godfrey
summary_text: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

name: Carnival of Souls
summary_text: After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.

name: A Good Old Fashioned Orgy
summary_text: A group of 30-year-olds who have been friends since high school attempt to throw an end-of-summer orgy.

name: All Eyez on Me
summary_text: Tells the true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur.

name: War, Inc.
summary_text: A corporation hires a professional assassin to pose as its trade show representative who must organize the wedding of a Middle Eastern pop star, which will allow him the opportunity to kill a Middle Eastern politician.

name: The Pagemaster
summary_text: A cowardly boy, who buries himself in accident statistics, enters a library to escape a storm, only to be transformed into an animated illustration by the Pagemaster. He has to work through obstacles from classic books to return to real-life.

name: Army of Shadows
summary_text: An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.

name: The Fly II
summary_text: The almost-human son of "Brundlefly" searches for a cure to his mutated genes while being monitored by a nefarious corporation that wishes to continue his father's experiments.

name: Fearless
summary_text: A man's personality is dramatically changed after surviving a major airline crash.

name: Mean Girls 2
summary_text: The Plastics are back in the long-awaited follow-up to the smash hit Mean Girls - and now the clique is more fashionable, funny, and ferocious than ever.
After mobiles start mysteriously flying out of the hands of people in Chennai, Dr Vaseegaran summons his trusted robot Chitti to ward off the bird-shaped supernatural powers of Pakshirajan.

name: Hamlet
summary_text: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, finds out that his uncle Claudius killed his father to obtain the throne, and plans revenge.

name: Down Periscope
summary_text: Lt. Cmdr. Tom Dodge is assigned as Captain to the USS Stingray, an old diesel driven submarine that has seen better days.

name: The Banker
summary_text: In the 1960s two African-American entrepreneurs hire a working-class white man to pretend to be the head of their business empire while they pose as a janitor and chauffeur.

name: After the Dark
summary_text: At an international school in Jakarta, a philosophy teacher challenges his class of twenty graduating seniors to choose which ten of them would take shelter underground and reboot the human race in the event of a nuclear apocalypse.

name: Yi Yi
summary_text: Each member of a middle-class Taipei family seeks to reconcile past and present relationships within their daily lives.

name: Away from Her
summary_text: A man coping with the institutionalization of his wife because of Alzheimer's disease faces an epiphany when she transfers her affections to another man, Aubrey, a wheelchair-bound mute who also is a patient at the nursing home.

name: Meet Me in St. Louis
summary_text: Young love and childish fears highlight a year in the life of a turn-of-the-century family.

name: It's Only the End of the World
summary_text: Louis (Gaspard Ulliel), a terminally ill writer, returns home after a long absence to tell his family that he is dying.

name: Stardust Memories
summary_text: While attending a retrospective of his work, a filmmaker recalls his life and his loves: the inspirations for his films.

name: Valiant
summary_text: At the height of World War II, a tiny wood pigeon enlists in the elite Royal Homing Pigeon Service to serve Britain, as the fearsome General Von Talon (Tim Curry) and his deadly squadron of falcons patrol the English Channel. Is he a war-hero in the making?

name: Embrace of the Serpent
summary_text: The story of the relationship between Karamakate, an Amazonian shaman and last survivor of his people, and two scientists who work together over the course of forty years to search the Amazon for a sacred healing plant.

name: Cool World
summary_text: When Jack Deebs was behind bars he found escape by creating Cool World, a cartoon series featuring a vixen named Holli Would. The flesh proves weaker than ink, however, as Holli takes human form in Las Vegas.

name: Hero
summary_text: A not-so-nice man rescues passengers from a crashed airliner, only to see someone else take credit.

name: Secret Superstar
summary_text: A talented teenage singer-songwriter living amid domestic abuse becomes a YouTube sensation after a video in which she hides her identity goes viral.

name: Wonderland
summary_text: In the police investigation of a brutal crime scene, one man was at the center of it all: legendary porn star John Holmes.

name: The Gauntlet
summary_text: A hard but mediocre cop is assigned to escort a prostitute into custody from Las Vegas to Phoenix, so that she can testify in a mob trial. But a lot of people are literally betting that they won't make it into town alive.

name: Mississippi Grind
summary_text: Down on his luck and facing financial hardship, Gerry teams up with younger charismatic poker player, Curtis, in an attempt to change his luck. The two set off on a road trip through the South with visions of winning back what's been lost.

name: Cold Creek Manor
summary_text: A family relocates from the city to a dilapidated house in the country that was once a grand estate. As they begin renovations, they discover their new home harbors a secret and may not be completely free of its former inhabitant.

name: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
summary_text: This story explores love - the shapes it takes, the ways it changes us and the exhilarating and often terrifying ride it takes us on. It is the journey of two characters, Alizeh and Ayan, as they navigate life, love and heartbreak.

name: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
summary_text: 19-year-old Billy Lynn is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle. Through flashbacks, the film shows what really happened to his squad - contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions.

name: Ugetsu
summary_text: A tale of ambition, family, love, and war set in the midst of the Japanese Civil Wars of the sixteenth century.

name: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran
summary_text: Ashwat Raina and his teammates arrive in Pokhran to re-conduct a confidential nuclear test, where they face challenges from the American Lacrosse satellite and local spies.

name: Tuck Everlasting
summary_text: A young woman meets and falls in love with a young man who is part of a family of immortals.

name: White Squall
summary_text: Teenage boys discover discipline and camaraderie on an ill-fated sailing voyage.

name: The Grudge
summary_text: A house is cursed by a vengeful ghost that dooms those who enter it with a violent death.

name: Horror of Dracula
summary_text: Jonathan Harker begets the ire of Count Dracula after he accepts a job at the vampire's castle under false pretenses, forcing his colleague Dr. Van Helsing to hunt the predatory villain when he targets Harker's loved ones.

name: Mr. Mom
summary_text: After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, a job he has no clue how to do.

name: Mars Needs Moms
summary_text: A young boy named Milo gains a deeper appreciation for his mom after Martians come to Earth to take her away.

name: Vanity Fair
summary_text: Growing up poor in London, Becky Sharp defies her poverty-stricken background and ascends the social ladder alongside her best friend, Amelia Sedley.

name: Shelter
summary_text: When his college dreams are sidelined by family obligations, a young man finds comfort in surfing with his best friend's brother.

name: The Upside of Anger
summary_text: When her husband unexpectedly disappears, a sharp-witted suburban wife and her daughters juggle their mom's romantic dilemmas and family dynamics.

name: A Little Chaos
summary_text: Two talented landscape artists become romantically entangled while building a garden in King Louis XIV's palace at Versailles.

name: I'm Still Here
summary_text: Documents Joaquin Phoenix's transition from the acting world to a career as an aspiring rapper.

name: Night of the Creeps
summary_text: Alien brain parasites, entering humans through the mouth, turn their host into a killing zombie. Some teenagers start to fight against them.

name: I Stand Alone
summary_text: A horse meat butcher's life and mind begins to breakdown as he lashes out against various factions of society while attempting to reconnect with his estranged daughter.

name: The House of the Spirits
summary_text: A rancher, his clairvoyant wife and their family face turbulent years in South America in this adaptation of Isabel Allende's best-seller.

name: Escobar: Paradise Lost
summary_text: In Colombia, a young surfer meets the woman of his dreams - and then meets her uncle, Pablo Escobar.

name: Arn: The Knight Templar
summary_text: Arn, the son of a high-ranking Swedish nobleman is educated in a monastery and sent to the Holy Land as a knight templar to do penance for a forbidden love.

name: The Angriest Man in Brooklyn
summary_text: A perpetually angry man is informed he has 90 minutes to live and promptly sets out to reconcile with his family and friends in the short time he has left.

name: Game Change
summary_text: Governor Sarah Palin of Alaska becomes Senator John McCain's running mate in the 2008 Presidential election.

name: Desperately Seeking Susan
summary_text: A bored New Jersey suburban housewife's fascination with a kooky character she's read about in the personal columns leads to her being mistaken for the woman herself.

name: The Beastmaster
summary_text: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

name: Nine Lives
summary_text: A stuffy businessman finds himself trapped inside the body of his family's cat.

name: Doghouse
summary_text: A group of men, heading to a remote village to help one of their friends get over his divorce, soon discover that all the women have been infected with a virus that makes them man-hating cannibals.

name: Vidocq
summary_text: Paris, 1830: Vidocq is killed by a mirror masked man. A thief turned investigator, he was working on a case of men killed by lightning. His biographer tries to solve the case.

name: The Last Seduction
summary_text: A devious sexpot steals her husband's drug money and hides out in a small town where she meets the perfect dupe for her next scheme.

name: The Great Raid
summary_text: Taking place towards the end of WWII, 500 American Soldiers have been entrapped in a camp for 3 years. Beginning to give up hope they will ever be rescued, a group of Rangers goes on a dangerous mission to try and save them.

name: First Daughter
summary_text: The daughter of the U.S. President heads off to college where she falls for a graduate student with a secret.

name: Wishmaster
summary_text: A demonic djinn attempts to grant its owner three wishes, which will allow him to summon his brethren to Earth.

name: Breakfast on Pluto
summary_text: In the 1970s, a young trans woman, Patrick "Kitten" Braden, comes of age by leaving her Irish town for London, in part to look for her mother and in part because her gender identity is beyond the town's understanding.

name: The Mauritanian
summary_text: Mohamedou Ould Slahi fights for freedom after being detained and imprisoned without charge by the U.S. Government for years.

name: Reds
summary_text: A radical American journalist becomes involved with the Communist revolution in Russia, and hopes to bring its spirit and idealism to the United States.

name: Neerja
summary_text: Neerja is the story of the courageous Neerja Bhanot, who sacrificed her life while protecting the lives of 359 passengers on the Pan Am flight 73 in 1986. The flight was hijacked by a terrorist organization.

name: Below
summary_text: Strange happenings occur on a WW II submarine.

name: Mom and Dad
summary_text: A teenage girl and her younger brother must survive a wild 24 hours during which a mass hysteria of unknown origin causes parents to turn violently on their own kids.

name: Disturbing Behavior
summary_text: The new kid in Cradle Bay, Washington stumbles across something sinister about the town's method of transforming its unruly teens into upstanding citizens.

name: Harriet
summary_text: The extraordinary tale of Harriet Tubman's escape from slavery and transformation into one of America's greatest heroes, whose courage, ingenuity, and tenacity freed hundreds of slaves and changed the course of history.

name: In July
summary_text: A young, insecure teacher embarks on a journey through Europe to Turkey, where he wants to see a woman again whom he believes to be his fate.

name: A Prayer Before Dawn
summary_text: The true story of an English boxer incarcerated in one of Thailand's most notorious prisons as he fights in Muay Thai tournaments to earn his freedom.

name: Ink
summary_text: A mysterious creature, known as Ink, steals a child's soul in hopes of using it as a bargaining chip to join the Incubi - the group of supernatural beings responsible for creating nightmares.

name: It Takes Two
summary_text: Alyssa and Amanda are two little girls who are identical, but complete strangers, that accidentally meet one day.

name: Blind Date
summary_text: A workaholic needs a date for a dinner with new important clientele, but who his brother sets him up with could lead to disaster.

name: Aile Arasinda
summary_text: Life of a singer, her daughter and her friends change when they meet with a divorced man.

name: Cult of Chucky
summary_text: Chucky returns to terrorize his human victim, Nica. Meanwhile, the killer doll has some scores to settle with his old enemies, with the help of his former wife.

name: Mutiny on the Bounty
summary_text: First mate Fletcher Christian leads a revolt against his sadistic commander, Captain Bligh, in this classic seafaring adventure, based on the real-life 1788 mutiny.

name: Family Plot
summary_text: A phony psychic/con artist and her taxi driver/private investigator boyfriend encounter a pair of serial kidnappers while trailing a missing heir in California.

name: The Ox-Bow Incident
summary_text: When a posse captures three men suspected of killing a local farmer, they become strongly divided over whether or not to lynch the men.

name: Strange Wilderness
summary_text: With the ratings dropping for a wilderness-themed television show, two animal fans go to the Andes Mountains in search of Bigfoot.

name: Special Correspondents
summary_text: A radio journalist and his technician get in over their heads when they hatch a scheme to fake their own kidnapping during a rebel uprising in South America and hide out in New York instead.

name: That Obscure Object of Desire
summary_text: Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen-year-old former chambermaid Conchita.

name: Excision
summary_text: A disturbed and delusional high school student with aspirations of a career in medicine goes to extremes to earn the approval of her controlling mother.

name: The Fly
summary_text: A scientist has a horrific accident when he tries to use his newly invented teleportation device.

name: Dügün Dernek
summary_text: A group of people in an eastern Turkish village are enlisted to throw a big and brash wedding in ten days notice.

name: State of Grace
summary_text: A New York cop is recruited to return to his hometown and infiltrate the mob ran by his best friend's brother.

name: Lakshya
summary_text: An aimless, jobless, irresponsible grown man joins the army and matures into a battlefield hero.

name: Redemption Day
summary_text: When the love of his life is kidnapped and held for ransom by terrorists, a war hero Brad Paxton races against the clock to rescue her in a daring and deadly operation that pits him against the most powerful and shadowy forces.

name: Only You
summary_text: As a teen, Faith was told that her destiny is a man named Damon Bradley. Years later - Faith is about to marry another man - a Damon Bradley calls to wish them all the best. Faith blows off the wedding and follows Damon to Italy.

name: The Rental
summary_text: Two couples rent a vacation home for what should be a celebratory weekend get-away.

name: Dear Frankie
summary_text: After having responded to her son's numerous letters in the guise of his father, a woman hires a stranger to pose as his dad when meeting him.

name: Clockers
summary_text: Young drug pushers in the projects of Brooklyn live hard dangerous lives, trapped between their drug bosses and the detectives out to stop them.

name: Jane Got a Gun
summary_text: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

name: Sound of My Voice
summary_text: Two documentary filmmakers attempt to penetrate a cult who worships a woman who claims to be from the future.

name: After We Collided
summary_text: Based on the 2014 romance novel of the same name, this follows the love life of two young adults.

name: Problem Child 2
summary_text: The worst child in the world makes an unthinkable discovery - there is another child even worse than him, and it's a girl.

name: The Boy and the Beast
summary_text: When a young orphaned boy living on the streets of Shibuya stumbles upon a fantastic world of beasts, he's taken in by a gruff warrior beast looking for an apprentice.

name: Home on the Range
summary_text: To save their farm, the resident animals go bounty hunting for a notorious outlaw.

name: Rock On!!
summary_text: Four friends reunite to relive their moments of glory as a rock band.

name: Rosencrantz & Guildenstern Are Dead
summary_text: Two minor characters from the play 'Hamlet' stumble around unaware of their scripted lives and unable to deviate from them.

name: House of Games
summary_text: A psychiatrist comes to the aid of a compulsive gambler and is led by a smooth-talking grifter into the shadowy but compelling world of stings, scams, and con men.

name: iBoy
summary_text: After being shot, Tom wakes from a coma to discover that fragments of his smart phone have been embedded in his head, and worse, that returning to normal teenage life is impossible because he has developed a strange set of superpowers.

name: True Memoirs of an International Assassin
summary_text: After a publisher changes a writer's debut novel about a deadly assassin from fiction to non-fiction, the author finds himself thrust into the world of his lead character, and must take on the role of his character for his own survival.

name: Pokémon the Movie 2000
summary_text: Ash Ketchum must gather the three spheres of fire, ice and lightning in order to restore balance to the Orange Islands.

name: Zorba the Greek
summary_text: An uptight English writer travelling to Crete, on a matter of business, finds his life changed forever when he meets the gregarious Alexis Zorba.

name: I Am Love
summary_text: Emma left Russia to live with her husband in Italy. Now a member of a powerful industrial family, she is the respected mother of three, but feels unfulfilled. One day, Antonio, a talented chef and her son's friend, makes her senses kindle.

name: Lorenzo's Oil
summary_text: A boy develops a disease so rare that nobody is working on a cure, so his father decides to learn all about it and tackle the problem himself.

name: Manon of the Spring
summary_text: A beautiful but shy shepherdess plots vengeance on the men whose greedy conspiracy to acquire her father's land caused his death years earlier.

name: Harlem Nights
summary_text: During the 1930s, a New York City illegal gambling house owner and his associates must deal with strong competition, gangsters, and corrupt cops in order to stay in business.

name: Kabadayi
summary_text: Ali Osman is living a quiet life after years of struggle, and tears. And he is slowly slipping into dementia. He made his peace with the horrible life he had and waiting for his final day ...                See full summary »

name: Quest for Fire
summary_text: This story takes place in prehistoric time when three tribesmen search for a new fire source.

name: The Battle of Britain
summary_text: In 1940, the British Royal Air Force fights a desperate battle to prevent the Luftwaffe from gaining air superiority over the English Channel as a prelude to a possible Axis invasion of the U.K.

name: Krrish 3
summary_text: Krrish and his scientist father have to save the world and their own family from an evil man named Kaal and his gang of mutants, led by the ruthless Kaya.

name: New World
summary_text: An undercover cop finds it difficult to play both a cop and a goon.

name: Aliens in the Attic
summary_text: A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens.

name: A Better Tomorrow
summary_text: A reforming ex-gangster tries to reconcile with his estranged policeman brother, but the ties to his former gang are difficult to break.

name: Tenebrae
summary_text: An American writer in Rome is stalked and harassed by a serial killer who is murdering everyone associated with his work on his latest book.

name: Dil To Pagal Hai
summary_text: A grand musical about three passionate and dreamy characters: Rahul, Pooja and Nisha. Will their dreams come true? Will they find their true love?

name: Welcome to Marwen
summary_text: A victim of a brutal attack finds a unique and beautiful therapeutic outlet to help him through his recovery process.

name: Our Brand Is Crisis
summary_text: A battle-hardened American political consultant is sent to help re-elect a controversial president in Bolivia, where she must compete with a long-term rival working for another candidate.

name: The Million Dollar Hotel
summary_text: Tragi-comic, romantic whodunnit set in a run down hotel which plays host to mentally ill people too poor to afford medical insurance.

name: Dark Blue
summary_text: A robbery homicide investigation triggers a series of events that will cause a corrupt LAPD officer to question his tactics.

name: The Last Mimzy
summary_text: Two siblings begin to develop special talents after they find a mysterious box of toys. Soon the kids, their parents, and even their teacher are drawn into a strange new world and find a task ahead of them that is far more important than any of them could imagine!

name: Scoob!
summary_text: Scooby and the gang face their most challenging mystery ever: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this dogpocalypse, the gang discovers that Scooby has an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined.

name: Blinded by the Light
summary_text: In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen.

name: Department Q: The Absent One
summary_text: The murder of young twins initially implicates a group of upper class students as the killers, though the case takes a turn or two from its starting point.

name: The Brady Bunch Movie
summary_text: The original 70s TV family is now placed in the 1990s, where they're even more square and out of place than ever.

name: The Best of Youth
summary_text: An Italian epic that follows the lives of two brothers, from the 1960s to the 2000s.

name: Pumpkinhead
summary_text: After a tragic accident, a man conjures up a towering, vengeful demon called Pumpkinhead to destroy a group of unsuspecting teenagers.

name: The Goods: Live Hard, Sell Hard
summary_text: Used-car liquidator Don Ready is hired by a flailing auto dealership to turn their Fourth of July sale into a majorly profitable event.

name: 100 Girls
summary_text: Matt spends the night with a girl in an elevator during power outage in a girls' college dorm. He never sees her. Waking up in the morning, panties are all that's left of her. How does he find her in a building with 100 girls?

name: Day for Night
summary_text: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.

name: Factory Girl
summary_text: Based on the rise and fall of socialite Edie Sedgwick, concentrating on her relationships with Andy Warhol and a folk singer.

name: The Bad News Bears
summary_text: An aging, down-on-his-luck ex-minor leaguer coaches a team of misfits in an ultra-competitive California little league.

name: Angela's Ashes
summary_text: Based on the best-selling autobiography by Irish expatriate Frank McCourt, Angela's Ashes follows the experiences of young Frankie and his family as they try against all odds to escape the ...                See full summary »

name: A Perfect Day
summary_text: A group of aid workers work to resolve a crisis in an armed conflict zone.

name: Tamara Drewe
summary_text: A young newspaper writer returns to her hometown in the English countryside, where her childhood home is being prepped for sale.

name: Creep 2
summary_text: A video artist looking for work drives to a remote house in the forest to meet a man claiming to be a serial killer. But after agreeing to spend the day with him, she soon realizes that she made a deadly mistake.

name: Les Misérables
summary_text: A cop from the provinces moves to Paris to join the Anti-Crime Brigade of Montfermeil, discovering an underworld where the tensions between the different groups mark the rhythm.

name: Demons
summary_text: A group of random people are invited to a screening of a mysterious movie, only to find themselves trapped in the theater with ravenous demons.

name: Bad News Bears
summary_text: A grizzled little league coach tries to turn his team of misfits into champs.

name: The Little Hours
summary_text: In the Middle Ages, a young servant fleeing from his master takes refuge at a convent full of emotionally unstable nuns. Introduced as a deaf mute man, he must fight to hold his cover as the nuns try to resist temptation.

name: Miss March
summary_text: Eugene believes in no sex before marriage. So DID his girlfriend, Cindi. His BFF loves sex. At Senior Prom, just before sex with Cindi, he falls into a coma. Waking up 4 years later, his Cindi is Miss March in Playboy. Can he get her back?

name: Last Year at Marienbad
summary_text: In a strange and isolated chateau, a man becomes acquainted with a woman and insists that they have met before.

name: How to Marry a Millionaire
summary_text: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

name: Trash
summary_text: Set in Brazil, three kids who make a discovery in a garbage dump soon find themselves running from the cops and trying to right a terrible wrong.

name: Wolfwalkers
summary_text: A young apprentice hunter and her father journey to Ireland to help wipe out the last wolf pack. But everything changes when she befriends a free-spirited girl from a mysterious tribe rumored to transform into wolves by night.

name: Namastey London
summary_text: A man takes his thoroughly-British daughter to his home country, India. There, he arranges her marriage to someone she considers a fool. The daughter attempts to outwit them, but the groom quietly and patiently hatches his own plan.

name: Sleepwalkers
summary_text: A mother-and-son team of strange supernatural creatures move to a small town to seek out a young virgin to feed on.

name: Rowdy Rathore
summary_text: A con man uncovers a deadly secret and must save his lady love, the small-town locals and the little girl who insists she's his daughter, from the mob.
Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.

name: Jay and Silent Bob Reboot
summary_text: Jay and Silent Bob inadvertently sign away their names and rights to the new Bluntman and Chronic movie. Now they head to Hollywood to stop the film from being made. Along the way Jay discovers that he is a father.

name: Butter
summary_text: In Iowa, a girl in foster care discovers her talent for butter carving and finds herself pitted against an ambitious local woman in their town's annual contest.

name: Yogi Bear
summary_text: A documentary filmmaker travels to Jellystone Park to shoot a project and soon crosses paths with Yogi Bear, his sidekick Boo-Boo and Ranger Smith.

name: Last Chance Harvey
summary_text: In London for his daughter's wedding, a rumpled man finds his romantic spirits lifted by a new woman in his life.

name: Thumbsucker
summary_text: Justin throws himself and everyone around him into chaos when he attempts to break free from his addiction to his thumb.

name: Mad Dog and Glory
summary_text: When shy, soft-spoken Chicago detective Wayne "Mad Dog" Dobie inadvertently saves the life of local gangster Frank Milo, he's the reluctant recipient of an unusual one week "thank you" gift - a beautiful bartender named Glory.

name: Twisted
summary_text: Jessica, whose father killed her mother and committed suicide, is a police officer. While investigating a murder, she finds herself in the center of her own investigation, when her former lovers start being murdered.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection "F"
summary_text: One peaceful day on Earth, two remnants of Freeza's army named Sorube and Tagoma arrive searching for the Dragon Balls with the aim of reviving Freeza. They succeed, and Freeza subsequently seeks revenge on the Saiya-jin.

name: When a Man Loves a Woman
summary_text: The seemingly perfect relationship between a man and his wife is tested as a result of her alcoholism.

name: Marauders
summary_text: When a bank is hit by a brutal heist, all evidence points to the owner and his high-powered clients. But as a group of FBI agents dig deeper into the case - and the deadly heists continue - it becomes clear that a larger conspiracy is at play.

name: Tillsammans
summary_text: In 1975, the dynamics of a Swedish commune begin to change upon the arrival of a beaten wife and her two kids.

name: Maximum Risk
summary_text: While seeking answers regarding the death of the twin brother he never knew he had, a French cop and his sibling's fiancée find themselves pursued by corrupt FBI agents and the Russian mafia.

name: Ain't Them Bodies Saints
summary_text: The tale of an outlaw who escapes from prison and sets out across the Texas hills to reunite with his wife and the daughter he has never met.

name: Mad Money
summary_text: Three female employees of the Federal Reserve plot to steal money that is about to be destroyed.

name: Devil's Knot
summary_text: The savage murders of three young children sparks a controversial trial of three teenagers accused of killing the kids as part of a Satanic ritual.

name: Immortal
summary_text: In the distant future, Earth is occupied by ancient gods and genetically altered humans. When a god is sentenced to death he seeks a new human host and a woman to bear his child.

name: The Women
summary_text: A wealthy New Yorker wrestles with the decision to leave her cheating husband, as she and her friends discover that women really can have it all.

name: Fame
summary_text: A chronicle of the lives of several teenagers who attend a New York high school for students gifted in the performing arts.

name: Lady Macbeth
summary_text: In 19th-century rural England, a young bride who has been sold into marriage discovers an unstoppable desire within herself as she enters into an affair with a worker on her estate.

name: The Beyond
summary_text: A young woman inherits an old hotel in Louisiana where, following a series of supernatural "accidents", she learns that the building was built over one of the entrances to Hell.

name: A Christmas Carol
summary_text: Ebenezer Scrooge, a curmudgeonly, miserly businessman, has no time for sentimentality and largely views Christmas as a waste of time. However, this Christmas Eve he will be visited by three spirits who will show him the errors of his ways.

name: Kelebegin Rüyasi
summary_text: In a small Turkish town, two young tuberculous poets try to survive while publishing their poems. As they both fall in love, their life would never be the same.

name: Our Kind of Traitor
summary_text: A couple finds themselves lured into a Russian oligarch's plans to defect, and are soon positioned between the Russian Mafia and the British Secret Service, neither of whom they can trust.
A man's life is derailed when an ominous pattern of events repeats itself in exactly the same manner every day, ending at precisely 2:22 p.m.

name: Earth Girls Are Easy
summary_text: A Southern California girl befriends three furry aliens after their spaceship lands in her swimming pool.

name: Red Rock West
summary_text: Upon arriving to a small town, a drifter is mistaken for a hitman, but when the real hitman arrives, complications ensue.

name: Curly Sue
summary_text: A homeless man and his young companion, who survive by conning people, meet a woman who may need them even more than they need her.

name: Dead Men Don't Wear Plaid
summary_text: Film noir parody with a detective uncovering a sinister plot. Characters from real noirs appear as scenes from various films are intercut.

name: Three Monkeys
summary_text: A family suffers from a major communication breakdown during their struggle to get through their hardships.

name: Setup
summary_text: A group of friends become involved in a potentially deadly diamond heist.

name: Le Havre
summary_text: When an African boy arrives by cargo ship in the port city of Le Havre, an aging shoe shiner takes pity on the child and welcomes him into his home.

name: Simon Birch
summary_text: A young boy with stunted growth is convinced that God has a great purpose for him.

name: 3 Ninjas
summary_text: Each year, three brothers visit their grandfather for the summer. He is highly skilled in ninjutsu, and for years he has trained the boys in his techniques.

name: A Place in the Sun
summary_text: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

name: Capricorn One
summary_text: When the first manned flight to Mars is deemed unsafe and scrubbed on the launch pad, anxious authorities must scramble to save face and retain their funding - and so an unthinkable plot to fake the mission is hatched.

name: The Signal
summary_text: A horror film told in three parts, from three perspectives, in which a mysterious transmission that turns people into killers invades every cell phone, radio, and television.

name: State and Main
summary_text: A movie crew invades a small town whose residents are all too ready to give up their values for showbiz glitz.

name: Oslo, August 31st
summary_text: One day in the life of Anders, a young recovering drug addict, who takes a brief leave from his treatment center to interview for a job and catch up with old friends in Oslo.

name: Captain Ron
summary_text: A Chicagoan inherits an old yacht. He, his wife, daughter and son fly to a Caribbean island and hire a dubious Captain Ron to sail them on an adventure to Miami.

name: A Short Film About Love
summary_text: An innocent virgin spies on his frontal neighbor and falls in love with her, thus starts using tricks on her which he hopes will lead to them meeting.

name: In China They Eat Dogs
summary_text: Two brothers, one cold and ruthless, the other sensitive and reluctant, and their brutal misadventures.

name: Killshot
summary_text: Beautiful Carmen Colson and her ironworker husband Wayne are placed in the Federal Witness Protection program after witnessing an "incident". Thinking they are at last safe, they are targeted by an experienced hit man and a psychopathic young upstart killer. The ensuing struggle will test Carmen to the limit.

name: What We Did on Our Holiday
summary_text: A family of five is off to Granddad's big 75th birthday party at an uncle's estate in rural Scotland. The parents are separated and hope their three kids won't mention it. The kids love, can talk with, and will do anything for, Granddad.

name: Survival of the Dead
summary_text: On an island off the coast of North America, local residents simultaneously fight a zombie epidemic while hoping for a cure to return their un-dead relatives back to their human state.

name: Ugly
summary_text: The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.

name: Knife in the Water
summary_text: A couple pick up a hitchhiker on the way to their yacht. The husband invites the young man to come along for their day's sailing. As the voyage progresses, the antagonism between the two men grows. A violent confrontation is inevitable.

name: Cat People
summary_text: An American man marries a Serbian immigrant who fears that she will turn into the cat person of her homeland's fables if they are intimate together.

name: Annapolis
summary_text: Set against the backdrop of boxing at the Naval Academy, centers on a young man from the wrong side of the tracks whose dream of attending Annapolis becomes a reality.

name: Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Next Generation
summary_text: A group of teenagers get into a car crash in the Texas woods on prom night, and then wander into an old farmhouse that is home to Leatherface (Robert Jacks) and his insane family of cannibalistic psychopaths.

name: Quigley Down Under
summary_text: Sharpshooter Matt Quigley is hired from Wyoming by an Australian rancher paying a very high price. But when Quigley arrives Down Under, all is not as it seems.

name: Metropolis
summary_text: Kenichi and his uncle Shunsaku Ban must find the mystery behind robot girl Tima.

name: Kingsglaive: Final Fantasy XV
summary_text: King Regis, who oversees the land of Lucis, commands his army of soldiers to protect the kingdom from the Niflheim empire's plans to steal the sacred crystal which gives Lucis its magic and power.

name: The Mountain
summary_text: The heroic story of two soldiers trapped in an ambush, fighting for their lives.

name: Feardotcom
summary_text: A New York City detective investigates mysterious deaths occurring 48 hours after users log onto a site named feardotcom.

name: Colette
summary_text: Colette is pushed by her husband to write novels under his name. Upon their success, she fights to make her talents known, challenging gender norms.

name: Funny Girl
summary_text: The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s. We see her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld girl, subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.

name: Redbelt
summary_text: A fateful event leads to a job in the film business for top mixed-martial arts instructor Mike Terry. Though he refuses to participate in prize bouts, circumstances conspire to force him to consider entering such a competition.

name: The Green Butchers
summary_text: 2 Danish friends are tired of their employer and open their own butcher shop. An electrician accidentally dies in the freezer and he's sold as marinated chicken and business picks up. What happens when they run out of "chicken"?
